## Hooks type

A map of hooks, keyed by the selector logic used to create the hook

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare type Hooks<S extends Selector> = Branded<{
    [HookName in S]: HookId;
}, "Hooks">;
```
**References:** [Selector](./react.selector.md)<!-- -->, [Branded](./react.branded.md)<!-- -->, [HookId](./react.hookid.md)
